doc.field: GREYHOUND CORP [G] COMPLETES BUS LINE SALE

- Greyhound corp said it completed the sale of its Greyhound Lines unit to Dallas-based GLI Holdings Inc for 350 mln dlrs in cash, securities, royalties and other considerations. Greyhound said GLI is authorized to continue using the familiar running dog logo on a red, white and blue shield, while Greyhound Corp will continue to use the running dog alone as its symbol.
